mapper.select: select bno, title, contents, writingTime, memberId, hit, recommend , division from board ORDER BY bno DESC
select bno, title, contents, writingTime , modifiedTime, memberId , hit , recommend from board where bno = #{bno}

select bno, title, contents, writingTime, memberId, hit, recommend , division from board
where title like '%${searchName}%'
where contents like '%${searchName}%'
where memberId like '%${searchName}%'
where title like '%${searchName}%' or contents like '%${searchName}%'
ORDER BY bno DESC
mapper.insert: insert into board (bno, title, contents, writingTime , memberId, hit , recommend , division) values (Board_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{title}, #{contents}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') , #{memberId} , 0 , 0 , #{division})
mapper.select: select COUNT(*) from reply where bno = #{bno}
mapper.insert: insert into reply (tno, rno, bno, memberId, rwritingTime , rcontents) values (reply_seq.NEXTVAL , #{rno} , #{bno}, #{memberId}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') , #{rcontents})
mapper.delete: delete from reply where rno = #{rno} and bno = #{bno}
